ChestLVInclineShoulderRaise.name: Lever Incline Shoulder Raise
ChestLVInclineShoulderRaise.preparation: Sit on lever chest press machine with shoulders aligned with lever grips. Grasp lever grips with shoulder width overhand grip. Push weight up so arms are straight.
ChestLVInclineShoulderRaise.execution: Raise shoulders toward lever grips as far as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.
ChestLVInclineShoulderRaise.comments: Keep arms straight throughout execution. For convenience, exercise can be performed immediately after warm up on Lever Incline Chest Press.
